label: Plex Movie agent support (Add themes to the updated Plex Movie agent)

Remove unused art (applies to collections, frees up space in your Plex metadata directory)
Remove unused posters (applies to collections, frees up space in your Plex metadata directory)
Automatically update items (only items changed or previously missing in ThemerrDB)
Update movie themes during automatic update
Update collection themes during automatic update
Update collection metadata for Plex Movie agent (Updates poster, art, and summary)
Update collection metadata for legacy agents (Updates poster, art, and summary)
Interval for automatic update task, in minutes (min: 15)
Interval for database cache update task, in minutes (min: 15)
PlexAPI Timeout, in seconds (min: 1)
Max Retries, integer (min: 0)
Multiprocessing Threads, integer (min: 1)
YouTube Cookies (JSON format)

Migrate collection metadata from < v0.3.0 (If you used Themerr before v0.3.0, set this to True)
